title: Help with ping issues.
body: Hi im a NA league player wich lives in thewest coast of canada and i have medium to high ping, any suggestions would be appreciated.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Your connection could just be going through some wear and tear while reaching the game server, and our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help tune things up a bit.   How your ISP routes to us could be a factor as well, and the configuring DNS steps in that guide could help with that.
